scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

line_text: Now are we well resolved; and, by God's help,

line_text: O'er France and all her almost kingly dukedoms,

line_text: Not worshipp'd with a waxen epitaph.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

line_text: Freely to render what we have in charge;

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

line_text: The Dauphin's meaning and our embassy?
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

line_text: We are no tyrant, but a Christian king;

line_text: Tell us the Dauphin's mind.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

line_text: Thus, then, in few.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. The Presence chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Would have him punished. And now to our French causes:
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Who are the late commissioners?
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: I one, my lord:
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Your highness bade me ask for it to-day.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: So did you me, my liege.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: And I, my royal sovereign.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Then, Richard Earl of Cambridge, there is yours;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: There yours, Lord Scroop of Masham; and, sir knight,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Grey of Northumberland, this same is yours:
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Read them; and know, I know your worthiness.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: My Lord of Westmoreland, and uncle Exeter,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: We will aboard to night. Why, how now, gentlemen!
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: What see you in those papers that you lose

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: So much complexion? Look ye, how they change!

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Their cheeks are paper. Why, what read you there

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: That hath so cowarded and chased your blood
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Out of appearance?
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: I do confess my fault;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: And do submit me to your highness' mercy.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: To which we all appeal.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: The mercy that was quick in us but late,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: By your own counsel is suppress'd and kill'd:
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: You must not dare, for shame, to talk of mercy;

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: For your own reasons turn into your bosoms,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: As dogs upon their masters, worrying you.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: See you, my princes, and my noble peers,

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: These English monsters! My Lord of Cambridge here,

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Belonging to his honour; and this man

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Hath, for a few light crowns, lightly conspired,

line_text: And sworn unto the practises of France,

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: What shall I say to thee, Lord Scroop? thou cruel,

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Ingrateful, savage and inhuman creature!
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Thou that didst bear the key of all my counsels,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: That knew'st the very bottom of my soul,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: That almost mightst have coin'd me into gold,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Wouldst thou have practised on me for thy use,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: May it be possible, that foreign hire

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Could out of thee extract one spark of evil

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: That might annoy my finger? 'tis so strange,

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Wonder to wait on treason and on murder:

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: And whatsoever cunning fiend it was

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: That wrought upon thee so preposterously

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Hath got the voice in hell for excellence:

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Do botch and bungle up damnation

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: From glistering semblances of piety;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: A soul so easy as that Englishman's.'

play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Why, so didst thou: seem they religious?

scene_title: SCENE II.  Southampton. A council-chamber.

line_text: Why, so didst thou: or are they spare in diet,

line_text: Free from gross passion or of mirth or anger,

line_text: And yet my sky shall not want.

line_text: That may be, for you bear a many superfluously, and

line_text: Even as your horse bears your praises; who would

line_text: you.

play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Now, welcome, Kate: and bear me witness all,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: That here I kiss her as my sovereign queen.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: God, the best maker of all marriages,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Combine your hearts in one, your realms in one!
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: As man and wife, being two, are one in love,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: So be there 'twixt your kingdoms such a spousal,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: That never may ill office, or fell jealousy,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Which troubles oft the bed of blessed marriage,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Thrust in between the paction of these kingdoms,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: To make divorce of their incorporate league;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: That English may as French, French Englishmen,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Receive each other. God speak this Amen!
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Amen!
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Prepare we for our marriage--on which day,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: My Lord of Burgundy, we'll take your oath,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: And all the peers', for surety of our leagues.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Then shall I swear to Kate, and you to me;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: And may our oaths well kept and prosperous be!
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. A royal palace.

line_text: Thus far, with rough and all-unable pen,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Our bending author hath pursued the story,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: In little room confining mighty men,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Mangling by starts the full course of their glory.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Small time, but in that small most greatly lived
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: This star of England: Fortune made his sword;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: By which the world's best garden be achieved,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: And of it left his son imperial lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Henry the Sixth, in infant bands crown'd King
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Of France and England, did this king succeed;
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Whose state so many had the managing,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: That they lost France and made his England bleed:
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: Which oft our stage hath shown; and, for their sake,
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE

line_text: In your fair minds let this acceptance take.
play_title_long: The Life of Henry the Fifth
scene_title: EPILOGUE
